Scot Reader

[quote name="Joe_G." post=2213300]Beautiful team collection![/QUOTE]

Thanks Joe — and thanks even more for all of your amazing research on the Old Judge “set”!
Good luck Scot, Denver cards are tough. I know how hard you worked to put that group together and I am sorry to see you selling it off.

[quote name="oldjudge" post=2213380]Good luck Scot, Denver cards are tough. I know how hard you worked to put that group together and I am sorry to see you selling it off.[/QUOTE]

Thank you Jay. The incredible intellectual capital that you and Joe expended on your book (and elsewhere) were a primary, indispensable driver behind my Denver collection. I would have liked to acquire every pose. But age, resources and circumstances come to bear.
TTT one time for price reduction.
I will take Healy.  PM Sent.
